metadata.name: A4Revolution
metadata.description:
「白纸革命」的诉求为何？  
主要是悼念在新疆乌鲁木齐火灾中，因疫情封控而不幸罹难的人。

「白纸革命」3点倡议  
1、把社交媒体头像和背景换成白色，将白纸的照片发到社交媒体并加上「#白纸革命」、「#A4Revolution」。  
2、用白纸贴满布告栏、走廊、食堂、公园，夺回所有他们用话语占领了的地方。  
3、在街头举起白纸，如果有人在举白纸，请加入他们。

What is the appeal of the "White Paper Revolution"?  
It is mainly to commemorate the unlucky people who were unlucky due to the epidemic control during the fire in Urumqi, Xinjiang.

"White Paper Revolution" 3 points  
1. Change the avatar and background of the social media to white, post the photo of the white paper to the social media and add "#白紙革命" and "#A4Revolution".  
2. Use white paper to cover bulletin boards, corridors, cafeterias, and parks, and take back all the places where they have occupied leadership with language.  
3. Hold up the white paper in the street, if someone is holding the white paper, please join them.
